title: ImThour
author: ImThour
content: Hello folks!I am willing to provide a loan service with no collateral and low-interest rate.Read this before applying:- USDT Only (TRC20 will be used for sending/receiving).- 1 month maximum period.- Only for Sr. Member and above.- I reserve all the rights to deny the loan request.- Lowest amount to request for a loan is $100.- Maximum amount depends on the forum role. (Legendary users can request up to $2,000)Interest Rate Structure:Code:Repayment in 0-3 Days: 0% InterestRepayment in 0-1 Week: 1.5% InterestRepayment in 1-2 Weeks: 2.5% InterestRepayment in 1 Month: 4.25% InterestFormat to apply:Code:[b]Loan Amount:[/b][b]Reason for the Loan:[/b][b]Repayment Date:[/b][b]Amount to be repaid:[/b][b]TRC20 Address:[/b]I will mention which address I have used to pay and which address you have to repay back to in every loan approved.Please do not PM me regarding any loan, everything will be dealt here in this forum thread.
